body.p:
I learn that at the Sept term of Inst an inditement was found against Mr E K Owsly for killing hogs at Cave City Hotel during last winter and further learn that Philip Wilder was the Principal witness in the Case I can state that I was living with E K Owsly a Portion of last ^(winter)^ and living there when I heard Mr Owsly direct Philip Wilder that he wanted him Wilder who was stewart at the Hotel to kill his Owslys hogs that were Runing around the Hotel and I heard Mr Owsly Caution wilder to be Particular and not to kill any but our own
hogs as there was some hogs belonging to other Parties living with his
and I further know that Mr Owsly discharged said wilder from his employ and since that time I know that wilder feeling have not been good toward Mr owsly indeed they have not been on speaking terms
and further from my knowledge and acquntace with Mr owsly I am satisfied that he would not have contracted the killing of any hogs but his own

Wilder attended to the Dinning room and Mr owsly was source of help and attended to office and if any hogs were killed
I am satisfied they were killed without Mr Owsly knowledge or consent
I know Mr Smith to be an honest and truthful man
